GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.35 to before v5.4.212
GSD.description:
net: Fix data-races around netdev_tstamp_prequeue.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.212 by commit a90afeab21aebc8085833d326872d83152f1a39c, it was introduced in version v2.6.35 by commit 3b098e2d7c693796cc4dffb07caa249fc0f70771. For more details please see the references link.
